title: Login issues (unable to connect to the login queue)
body: Hello, league of legends was working perfectly fine then this morning i'm getting Login issues. the server says everything is fine but i'm still not able to login. I've tried nearly everything. anyone having this problem?

replies.body: Hi folks - thanks for reporting.  We're checking into this one now.  Stand by!

Hello Agent Mindstar. It says that every time I try to login it says **"Unable to connect to login queue"**. My intial is that considering the new champion today, the servers are full. But however, my friends **are able to login and enjoy League of Legends without this same issue. **

Thank you in advance for checking into this issue.
People who use Spark NZ as their internet provider have this problem. :(
Is this actually confirmed? cause i use spark :/
I highly doubt it anything to do with a single ISP just wait for riot to fix
Just trying to log on to grind that solo q so i can get out of this low diamond elo trash
